trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The champion of molag bal's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: charm person 3/day: branding smite 2/day: crown of madness 1/day: dominate person

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion of molag bal can attack 2 times.

action.name: Mace of Molag Bal
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. When hit by the mace, the creature has to roll a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have imposed disadvantage on their next melee attack roll.
